data.description:
🏀🏈⚾ GYM CLASS is the top VR basketball & sports game. Experience NBA licensed team courts with full-court games, social worlds for pickup games with friends, and football & baseball stadiums. Rated best on Quest, GC delivers top-notch simulation physics, environments, gameplay, avatars, and cosmetics. Tag your opponents in a fast-paced match, or play rec games - GC is where ballers unite.

Download free to enjoy:
🏈⚾ Sandbox: Football baseball, & more activities.
🌍 Social Worlds: Connect to the best community in epic environments.
➕ Physics Engine: Use real-life shooting, passing, dribbling in realtime, multiplayer games. Get superpowers w/ insane dunks too.
🤖 Game Modes: Multiplayer 2v2, 3v3, & 4v4 game modes & AI.
🎨 Design Your Look: Complete challenges to unlock cosmetics.
🏆 Stats & Matchmaking: Track your wins and improve your skills.

NBA Bundle unlocks:
😮 NBA team courts: Virtual replicas of all 30 NBA team courts.
👕 NBA team branded apparel: Two different sets of team-branded apparel, a team-branded basketball, and team-branded hat. Additional NBA & team-branded basketballs & accessories is available for purchase separately.
🏆 NBA Bundle Challenges: Play games to unlock NBA team features.

GC PRO unlocks: 
🏠 Private Courts: Customize your world, set your rules.
👕 Nextgen Avatars: Design your player w/ max control. Hairstyles, facial hair, body shapes, & height.
🎨 Cosmetics: Unlock a wide variety of cosmetics from hoodies, glasses, headphones, & gorilla around w/ banana hats.
